metadata.name: Bucket::DefaultAcl
metadata.description:
Bucket Default Access Control List

Represents a Bucket’s Default Access Control List.

require “gcloud”

gcloud = Gcloud.new storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket “my-bucket”

bucket.default_acl.readers.each { reader puts reader }

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::reload!
metadata.description: Reloads all Default Access Control List data for the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.reload!

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::owners
metadata.description: Lists the default owners for files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.owners.each { |owner| puts owner }

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::writers
metadata.description: Lists the default writers for files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.writers.each { |writer| puts writer }

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::readers
metadata.description: Lists the default readers for files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::add_owner
metadata.description: Grants default owner permission to files in the bucket.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_owner "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_owner "group-#{email}"

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::add_writer
metadata.description: Grants default writer permission to files in the bucket.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.add_writer "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_writer "group-#{email}"

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::add_reader
metadata.description: Grants default reader permission to files in the bucket.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_reader "group-#{email}"

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::delete
metadata.description: Permanently deletes the entity from the bucket’s default access control list for files.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.delete "user-#{email}"

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::auth!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the default authenticatedRead predefined ACL rule to files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.auth!

metadata.name: DefaultAcl::owner_full!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the default bucketOwnerFullControl predefined ACL rule to files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.owner_full!
